thread.title: 'Suffragette' embodies its message of equality for women

title: 'Suffragette' embodies its message of equality for women
text:
> Entertainment 'Suffragette' embodies its message of equality for women In this image released by Focus Features, Carey Mulligan portrays Maud Watts, center, in a scene from the film, "Suffragette." The movie opens in U.S. theaters on Oct. 23, 2015. (Steffan Hill/Focus Features via AP) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
